SALSubsystem.Name: AdamSensors
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC ADAM 6024 device connected to up to 6 transducer type sensors

SALSubsystem.Name: ATSpectrograph
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for the Auxiliary Telescope Spectrograph.

SALSubsystem.Name: Authorize
SALSubsystem.Description: Service that supports requests to change the authorization list for a CSC.
SALSubsystem.Generics: command_setAuthList, command_setLogLevel, logevent_authList, logevent_heartbeat, logevent_logLevel, logevent_logMessage

SALSubsystem.Name: LinearStage
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for the Linear Stage

SALSubsystem.Name: MTMount
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for the Main Telescope Mount

SALSubsystem.Name: NewMTMount
SALSubsystem.Description: Temporary version of MTMount for use with salobj. Once the Tekniker code stops trying to handle commands and events we can get rid of this and use the MTMount (after updating the metadata). Note that Tekniker low-level code will probably continue to output telemetry.

SALSubsystem.Name: CCArchiver
SALSubsystem.Description: ComCam Image Archiver

SALSubsystem.Name: ATArchiver
SALSubsystem.Description: LATISS Image Archiver

SALSubsystem.Name: CCOODS
SALSubsystem.Description: ComCam Observatory Operations Data Service

SALSubsystem.Name: ATOODS
SALSubsystem.Description: LATISS Observatory Operations Data Service

SALSubsystem.Name: ATAOS
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for the Auxiliary Telescope Active Optics System

SALSubsystem.Name: ATBuilding
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for the building housing the Auxiliary Telescope on Callibration Hill

SALSubsystem.Name: DIMM
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for the DIMM (Differential Image Motion Monitor) telescope
SALSubsystem.SoftwareLanguage: Python for high level, Java for low level

SALSubsystem.Name: ATDome
SALSubsystem.Description: Control the Auxiliary Telelescope dome, including azimuth and shutter doors.
SALSubsystem.VendorContact: The control system consists of an in house CSC that talks over TCP/IP to a low-level controller written by Astronomical Consulting Equipment.

SALSubsystem.Name: ATDomeTrajectory
SALSubsystem.Description: Command the auxiliary telescope dome (ATDome) to follow the telescope.

SALSubsystem.Name: ATMCS
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Auxiliary Telescope Mount Control System

SALSubsystem.Name: ATPneumatics
SALSubsystem.Description: Controls the support system for the mirrors on the Auxtel
SALSubsystem.Github: https://github.com/lsst-ts/ts_ATPneumaticsSimulator just the simulator not the final code

SALSubsystem.Name: ATHeaderService
SALSubsystem.Description: HeaderService for AT

SALSubsystem.Name: CCHeaderService
SALSubsystem.Description: HeaderService for ComCam

SALSubsystem.Name: MTHeaderService
SALSubsystem.Description: HeaderService for MT

SALSubsystem.Name: ATHexapod
SALSubsystem.Description: Controls the Hexpod that positions the secondary mirror of the Aux tel

SALSubsystem.Name: ATMonochromator
SALSubsystem.Description: Controls the monochromator for the AT calibration system

SALSubsystem.Name: ATWhiteLight
SALSubsystem.Description: Controls the white light source for the AT calibration system.

SALSubsystem.Name: ATCamera
SALSubsystem.Description: Auxilliary telescope camera

SALSubsystem.Name: ATPtg
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Auxiliary Telescope Pointing Component
SALSubsystem.SoftwareLanguage: C++ used for low level and CSC, Python for the UI

SALSubsystem.Name: IOTA
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Initial Optical Testing Assembly

SALSubsystem.Name: MTPtg
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Main Telescope Pointing component
SALSubsystem.SoftwareLanguage: C++ used for low level and CSC, Python for the UI

SALSubsystem.Name: Electrometer
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Electrometer

SALSubsystem.Name: EAS
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Environmental Awareness System

SALSubsystem.Name: ESS
SALSubsystem.Description: Environmental Sensor System

SALSubsystem.Name: LOVE
SALSubsystem.Description: User interface for the LSST control system.

SALSubsystem.Name: CCCamera
SALSubsystem.Description: ComCam camera

SALSubsystem.Name: MTCamera
SALSubsystem.Description: LSST Main Camera

SALSubsystem.Name: CatchupArchiver
SALSubsystem.Description: Catchup Archiver

SALSubsystem.Name: CBP
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Collimated Beam Projector

SALSubsystem.Name: Dome
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Dome Control System

SALSubsystem.Name: Environment
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for getting data from the Weather Station

SALSubsystem.Name: Hexapod
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for both the Camera and M2 Hexapod

SALSubsystem.Name: HVAC
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the HVAC control in the Main Telescope

SALSubsystem.Name: TunableLaser
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Tunable Laser

SALSubsystem.Name: MTM1M3
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the M1M3 Mirror Support System

SALSubsystem.Name: MTM1M3TS
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the M1M3 Mirror Thermal Control System

SALSubsystem.Name: MTAlignment
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Alignment System Control (ASC)

SALSubsystem.Name: MTAOS
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Main Telescope Active Optics System

SALSubsystem.Name: MTM2
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the M2 Mirror Support System

SALSubsystem.Name: MTVMS
SALSubsystem.Description: the CSC for the Vibration Monitoring System

SALSubsystem.Name: Rotator
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Camera Rotator

SALSubsystem.Name: Scheduler
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Scheduler of both the Main and Auxiliary Telescope

SALSubsystem.Name: Script
SALSubsystem.Description: A "SAL script" that performs some action using SAL and then quits. SAL Scripts are managed by the ScriptQueue.
SALSubsystem.Generics: command_setAuthList, command_setLogLevel, logevent_authList, logevent_heartbeat, logevent_logLevel, logevent_logMessage

SALSubsystem.Name: ScriptQueue
SALSubsystem.Description: A CSC that manages SAL Scripts (see the Script subsystem).

SALSubsystem.Name: FiberSpectrograph
SALSubsystem.Description: A CSC that manages the Fiber Spectrographs that are used to measure the calibration light sources.

SALSubsystem.Name: MTDomeTrajectory
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Main Telescope Dome Trajectory

SALSubsystem.Name: MTEEC
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Environmental Enclosure Component

SALSubsystem.Name: GenericCamera
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Generic Camera

SALSubsystem.Name: Test
SALSubsystem.Description: A SAL component designed to support testing SAL itself.

SALSubsystem.Name: Watcher
SALSubsystem.Description: A CSC that listens other CSCs and uses that data to produces alarms for the user interface.

SALSubsystem.Name: SummitFacility
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for controlling the summit facility of the main telescope

SALSubsystem.Name: DSM
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for transmitting information from the Dome Seeing Monitor
